Posts.Content: Feb 12, 2010 06:24PM sloop wrote: greetings well for starters i don't know where to begin wife was dx  in dec with  brain mets and i thoght at the time it was over but she is now on tykerb and xeloda and  all i can say is wowsers.there has been quite an improvement in the  past 6 weeks so  don't despair.she even went out today to do some shopping which she wouldn't even think about for xmas .hang in there ,as i was told by a rep from the tykerb people who wouldn't elaborate on the  drug when asked about the success they were having with this  combo of tykerb and xeloda he simply said that some  folks had described it as a  miracle drug . i don't post often but  i read youer posts all the time and i will keep you in my thoughts and prayers  .remember no retreat and no surrender .
Posts.Title: Really crappy news :-(((( konakat pee

Posts.Content: Jan 28, 2010 06:41AM sloop wrote: greetings all wife has started her second cycle of tykerb and xeloda  tomorrow.she takes 1150 mgs of tykerb at 6 am on an empty stomach waits an hour  and has her breakfast at 7 am .at 730 she takes 1150 mgs of xeloda and again a half an hour after supper at 730 pm.this is  working well for her only hhad a couple of bouts of  diarrahea that was resloved with only 2 immodium.some dry skin seems to be the only se  so far  she has no other  complaints .visited with her onco  yesterday and she was amazed at the results of her bloodwork and the visual examination.you can  clearly see that this combination is working and we hope that this combo will cross the  bbb and  zap them brain mets into oblivion.she has  gained  10 pounds  since the 23 of dec and is  feeeling better .she is getting around with a  walker for now but can walk short distances on her own.i hope this combo works as well for you as  it seems to be for  my wife .even with only 1 cycle  completed there is a definate improvement and  hope that it  continues .god bless sloop
Posts.Title: New to Xeloda/tykerb cindyp15 cindyp15

Posts.Content: sloop wrote: greetings in dec past wife was tx with wbr 3gy persession for 5 sessions .does that  translate to 300 centigray per session.18 plus lesions showed shrinkage and  most gone except for  10 which started enlarging in june  's ct scan .she then recieved linear accelerator or "gamma knife " i am assuming is the  same .she recieved 7 sessions at 283 centigray per session.we have an appointment with dr  on monday to  get  the report or see what else can be  done .how much  radiation can one   safely recieve for lesions on brain and can  gamma knife be  done again.thanks any  input greatly appreciated . sloop SLOOP Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: how much radiation sloop chainsawz

Posts.Content: Feb 18, 2010 04:18PM sloop wrote: greetings hope you  have  fantastic results from this combo.my wife was dx with brain mets in dec  and had wbrt .started on tykerb and xeloda first of january and her response has been  incredible.she was in a wheelchair and could only walk in the  house with the aid of a  walker .today she was out picking up  groceries and even went to wally mart and bought a new  coat.she is walking without any assistance from me  or any walking aids .she seen her onco  yesterday and  she was amazed with the  results  especially since  she has also  gained almost 20 pounds .while on xeloda and tykerb she has  days that she is a  lil tired but no nail problems yet .had  only 1 bout of  diarrhea which cleared up with  immodium.doc  told her  prevention is  better than  cure so she has been using a  moisturizer called  moisturel and so  far  no problems with  h/f  syndrome.she will have a  ct scan  on the 12 th which will give us a better idea of what is  happening with   the brain mets but her onco  is  confident that the way she is responding to this   combo that  the  drugs are working  on those also .its a wait  pray and see game  that  i wish nobody  ever had to  play .she is s starting her  3 rd cycle tomorrow . it has been a  miracle  drug for  us and i hope and pray it will do the same   for  you. sloop
Posts.Title: Xeloda/Tykerb jneumann jneumann

Posts.Content: sloop wrote: greetings today we had a call from the oncologist with the rersults of a ct  done on friday.the news was  fantastic.tumors on left side are  gone  with signifacant shrinkage to the  tumors on the right  chest wall.but the greatest  news is that the lesions on her brain have also   shrunk .we are more hopeful than ever  that this  continues .wife has started her  3 rd round of the combination friday  past.i hope and pray for all you  that  have this disease that  you too will have  the same  responses to  this and other treatments .god bless sloop SLOOP Log in to post a reply
